title: abhayakaram
sahitya:
abhaya karam koDut-tAdari rAmA abhaya karam koDut-tAdari

anupallavi

japa tapa yOgattAl dEvarum pUjikkum pAdAmbujam enran uyvazhi enraDaindEn

caraNam

kAmaripu villoDittu vaLar mighu bhUmaghaL kaip-piDitta punita karam kOvalaraik-kAkka
 gOvardhanagiri kuDai piDitta kOmaLakaram bhAratap-pOrinil pArthanukkAgap-parinaDattiya
 padma karam pAril unnai nADum pAmarar uyya aruL pAlikkum parimaLa mughumunran
